name: AWS CloudTrail Lake
description: Export LaunchDarkly audit events to AWS CloudTrail Lake via Open Audit Events.
author: LaunchDarkly

formVariables.name: AWS account ID
formVariables.description: Enter your [AWS account ID](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/console_account-alias.html#FindingYourAWSId). The associated account must be configured to use CloudTrail Lake.

formVariables.name: Ingest IAM Role ARN
formVariables.description: Enter the ARN of the IAM Role for LaunchDarkly to assume to post to your AWS CloudTrail destination.

formVariables.name: Channel ARN
formVariables.description: Enter the Channel ARN for LaunchDarkly to use.
